text:
*Title:* Gone with the Wind
*Year:* 1939
*Rated:* G
*Released:* 17 Jan 1940
*Runtime:* 238 min
*Genre:* Drama, History, Romance
*Director:* Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood
*Writer:* Margaret Mitchell (story of the old south

), Sidney Howard (screenplay)
*Actors:* Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O"Neil, Vivien Leigh, Evelyn Keyes
*Plot:* American film classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
*Language:* English
*Country:* USA
*Awards:* Won 8 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 9 nominations.
*Metascore:* N/A
